Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.view

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.view.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable<PlayerEvent>, Observer<GameSession>
public class VirtualView
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer<GameSession>, Observable<PlayerEvent>
Represents the View component from the MVC pattern in a client-server architecture

  • Method Details

    • submitConnection

      public ServerSideProtocol submitConnection​(java.lang.String username, java.net.Socket socket)
      Registers the connection of a player (the socket will have to be passed to the server-side protocol)
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player recently connected
      socket - Server Socket for the active connection with the player
      Returns:
      the serverSideProtocol

    • startAllPlayers

      public void startAllPlayers()
      Calls the 'run' method of all players' seversideprotocols because the maximum number of players in the game session has been reached

    • compressGameSession

      public CompressedModel compressGameSession​(java.lang.String username, GameSession gameSession)
      Creates a compressed (serializable) game session snapshot for the player
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the player that will receive the message
      gameSession - Reference to the party's game session
      Returns:
      the CompressedModel instance

    • reconnectPlayer

      public ServerSideProtocol reconnectPlayer​(java.lang.String username, java.net.Socket socket)
      Reconnect the player to the game by updating the socket of the respective serversideprotocol
      Parameters:
      username - of the player trying to reconnect
      socket - new socket of the player trying to reconnect
      Returns:
      the restarted serverSideProtocol instance
